fn.p: Competing Interests: SLN is an employee of the World Health Organization (WHO). When this study was executed, VIS was a contractor, MF a consultant, and TVP an intern at WHO. SLN and MF were involved in the development of several of the information products assessed in this study. MF's spouse is a current employee of Bristol Myers-Squibb and owns stock as part of her remuneration. The authors have no other interests to declare. This does not alter the authors' adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
